With a blood-curdling scream, Hellboy grabs his horns wit both hands, brutally snaps them off. Energy spews from th stumps. He stabs Grigory with one of them. Grigory drops to his k holding his stomach. Hellboy drops the blood-stained horn The final lock disappears into the stone. The light flick and the connection with the moon is broken. Ilsa, licking her bloody lips, looks up. The sky is silen The thunderclouds are parting. The eclipse has ended. Grigory crumples in agony. The burning glyphs in Hellboy's stone hand dim down, his  features and body resume their usual shape. All is quiet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You will never fulfill your destiny.  You will never understand the power  inside you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I can live with that.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He breaks Myers' chains, helps him up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hellboy painfully takes Liz's limp body in his arms. Myer stands by his side. He kisses her forehead, caresses her hair, then walks dow the steps. Myers steps on something. He looks under his foot: A smas GLASS EYE. Then... out of the silence, a WHISPER.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Child...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hellboy turns. Grigory, on his knees, smiles.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (dying) Look what you've done --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He looks up. In his empty eye socket, fleshy tendrils shi lazily.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You've killed me -- an insignificant  man... but you have brought forth a  God.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He uncovers his abdomen. Long, fleshy pseudopods spill ou of the wound, like intestines. A large entity erupts from Grigory's torso and claws the  air.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Behold, my master, Behemoth. Guardian  of thresholds, destroyer of worlds.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Covered in steamy slime, a seven foot, multi-tentacled sh BABY BEHEMOTH -- lands on the stone slab. The squirming f surges up like greasy pink foam. Growing exponentially by the second. Ilsa kneels and embraces Grigory's corpse. Kisses him on mouth. A gargantuan tentacled shadow looms above them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hell will hold no surprises for us.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A tower of flesh disdainfully crushes them both.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In a passageway, Hellboy carefully hands Liz's body over Myers.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Keep her safe. No matter what. I'll  deal with whatever's back there.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alone?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How big can it be?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As if in response, a massive tentacle fills the tunnel,  reaching for him. Oil lamps hanging from the ceiling smas onto HELLBOYВґS head as he is pulled back at breakneck sp finally confronting --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BEHEMOTH!!! The size of a house -- Hellboy -- head smoking -- writhes in the grip of the  tentacle. It suddenly throws him toward the ceiling. As he arcs back down, ABM!! -- he cracks the floor wide o Next to him: the rosary and the EXPLOSIVE BELTS. He tries grab them. The tentacle slams down, blocking his way. The vibration sends the belts down into the crack. They b off a small ledge and land further down. Far below, grind cogwheels and gears. Hellboy manages to pull a steel sword from the closest ma statue. Hellboy stands up and swings the sword for all he's worth FWAP! He cuts clean through the tentacle. The tip hits th floor, rolling into the crack. From out of Behemoth's stump... a mass of wriggling tenta replaces the cut-off section! They squirm around Hellboy' face as he slashes, again and again, fighting his way for He leans into the crack, stretches his arm, struggling to grab the belts. A few inches short. He jumps into the cre onto the first ledge. It crumbles!! The gears below grind a few falling bricks. The belts sli away. A tentacle captures Hellboy, pulls him up. At the last se he grabs the belts with his tail. The beast raises Hellboy high. A multi-layered mouth open in the body of BEHEMOTH. The most horrible proboscis ever seen. Hellboy's tail passes him the belts. The timers on them are crushed. A spark spurts: Useless.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They never work --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He wraps them around his stone arm.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ugh -- Now, this is gonna hurt --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He pulls the pin on all the explosives. BEHEMOTH drops hi into a squid-like beak and gulps him down. After a moment, a weird gurgle emanates from the creature innards. Then --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A surge of light roils within the thing, outlining the pu organs. The creature starts to burn.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A chain reaction yields a cacophony of explosions as Behe is enveloped in a cloud of fire, goo and soft flesh. Hellboy lands with a sickening, bone-crunching THUD!!! With a bellow, Behemoth goes down, the limp tentacles mis Hellboy as they vanish in a blaze of energy and light.  Finally, just a few cinders of flesh float in the air.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hellboy stands, covered in goo. Two final shockwaves of l ripple over the ground.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ouch -- It did hurt.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hellboy lurches into the passageway and spots Myers. Pain drags himself over. Liz's body is on the floor. Manning limps in from an adjacent room. Hellboy cradles L head in his huge hand. Holds her against his powerful che and whispers in her ear. A beat or two, then a moan.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In the dark -- I heard your voice --  What -- did you say -- ?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He looks at her, lovingly caressing her hair.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "You, on the other side: let her go.  Because for her, for her -- I'll  die. I'll cross over." (beat) "And you'll be sorry I did."

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Myers smiles. Liz looks at Hellboy for the first time as  what he is: the man she loves. A warm, gentle fire rims h body. Manning watches. Agent Myers smiles a sad smile, illumina by the flames. Hellboy and Liz kiss. The fire haloes them and builds as Waits' CINNY'S WALTZ fills the air.
